Permission.label: Command permission
Permission.tooltip: Set the permission for use of command

PermissionInfo.label: Permission info
PermissionInfo.tooltip:
Leave blank, type a number or the specific users
(like this: User1 User2 User3 User4)

Command.label: Command
Command.tooltip: Change the command for this function

BetDuration.label: Betting duration
BetDuration.tooltip: The amount of time (in seconds) players may bet on the winner.

MinRoulette.label: Minimum roulette amount
MinRoulette.tooltip:
The minimum roulette amount that you may use when challenging a user.
I would recommend nothing less than 1.

MaxRoulette.label: Maximum roulette amount
MaxRoulette.tooltip:
The maximum bet that you may use when challenging a user.
infinite = 0

MinBet.label: Minimum bet amount
MinBet.tooltip:
The minimum bet that you may use when betting on a user.
I would recommend nothing less than 1.

MaxBet.label: Maximum bet amount
MaxBet.tooltip:
The maximum bet that you may use when betting on a user.
infinite = 0

DurationBetweenRounds.label: Duration between each roulette shot
DurationBetweenRounds.tooltip: The duration (in seconds) between each roulette round (player 1 and player 2)

PendingDuration.label: No response timeout
PendingDuration.tooltip: The amount of seconds the target has to accept the challenge

NoPermissionMessage.value: $(Display), you have no permission to use the command!
NoPermissionMessage.label: No permission
NoPermissionMessage.tooltip: Bot response if no permission to use command

PersonalCooldownMessage.value: $(Display), you have $(CooldownLeft) seconds left on your cooldown!
PersonalCooldownMessage.label: Personal cooldown
PersonalCooldownMessage.tooltip: Bot response if the command is on personal cooldown

ChannelCooldownMessage.value: $(Display), there is a channel cooldown on $(ChannelCooldownLeft) seconds!
ChannelCooldownMessage.label: Channel cooldown
ChannelCooldownMessage.tooltip: Bot response if the command is on channel cooldown

BetYourselfMessage.value: $(Display), you are unable to bet on your own game.
BetYourselfMessage.label: Bet on their own game
BetYourselfMessage.tooltip: Bot response if someone is trying to bet on their own game.

ShowBetYourselfMessage.label: Display bet on your own game message?
ShowBetYourselfMessage.tooltip: Display bet on thir own game message?

AlreadyBettedMessage.label: Double bet message
AlreadyBettedMessage.tooltip: Bot response if someone is trying bet twice.

BetOutOfRangeDownMessage.value: $(Display), you have to bet at least $(MinBet) $(Currency)
BetOutOfRangeDownMessage.label: Bet too low message
BetOutOfRangeDownMessage.tooltip: Bot response if someone is trying bet under the limit.

ShowBetOutOfRangeDownMessage.label: Display bet too low message?
ShowBetOutOfRangeDownMessage.tooltip: Display when someone is trying bet under the limit?

BetOutOfRangeUpMessage.value: $(Display), you are unable to bet more than $(MaxBet) $(Currency)
BetOutOfRangeUpMessage.label: Bet too high message
BetOutOfRangeUpMessage.tooltip: Bot response if someone is trying to bet above the limit.

ShowBetOutOfRangeUpMessage.label: Display bet too high message?
ShowBetOutOfRangeUpMessage.tooltip: Display when someone is trying bet under the limit?

NotEnoughPointsMessage.value: $(Display) does not have enough $(Currency) to bet $(BetAmount)
NotEnoughPointsMessage.label: Not enough points to bet message
NotEnoughPointsMessage.tooltip: Bot response if someone is betting above what they own.

ShowNotEnoughPointsMessage.label: Display double bet message?
ShowNotEnoughPointsMessage.tooltip: Display when someone is betting above their points limit?

BetCompleteMessage.label: Bet complete message
BetCompleteMessage.tooltip: Bot response when a bet has been placed.

InvalidBetMessage.label: Invalid bet message
InvalidBetMessage.tooltip: Bot response when a bet is invalid, and aborted.

GameInProgressMessage.value: A game is in progress already. Please wait.
GameInProgressMessage.label: Game already running message
GameInProgressMessage.tooltip: Bot response when a game is running already.

NotChallengedMessage.label: Not challenged message
NotChallengedMessage.tooltip: Bot response you have nothing to accept/reject.

TooLowRouletteMessage.value: $(Display), you have to bet at least $(MinRoulette) $(Currency)
TooLowRouletteMessage.label: Roulette too low
TooLowRouletteMessage.tooltip: Bot response if roulette is too low

TooHighRouletteMessage.value: $(Display), you are unable to bet more than $(MaxRoulette) $(Currency)
TooHighRouletteMessage.label: Roulette too high
TooHighRouletteMessage.tooltip: Bot response if roulette is too high

RouletteAcceptedMessage.value: $(Display) accepted the challenge against $(Challenger) and betting has begun (active for $(BetDuration) seconds).
RouletteAcceptedMessage.label: Roulette accepted message
RouletteAcceptedMessage.tooltip: Bot response when someone accepts a challenge.

ChallengeYourselfMessage.value: You are unable to challenge yourself, but nice try!
ChallengeYourselfMessage.label: Challenge yourself message
ChallengeYourselfMessage.tooltip: Bot response when someone tries to challenge themselves.

InvalidRouletteNumberMessage.value: Argument 3 has to be a number: $(Command) [USER] [BET AMOUNT]
InvalidRouletteNumberMessage.label: Invalid roulette number
InvalidRouletteNumberMessage.tooltip: Bot response if someone bets an invalid amount

RouletteTooLowMessage.value: $(Display), you have to bet at least $(MinRoulette) $(Currency)
RouletteTooLowMessage.label: Roulette value too low
RouletteTooLowMessage.tooltip: Bot response if someone tries to bet underneath the minimum value.

ShowRouletteTooLowMessage.label: Display roulette value too low message?
ShowRouletteTooLowMessage.tooltip: Display roulette value too low message?

RouletteTooHighMessage.value: $(Display), you are unable to bet more than $(MaxRoulette) $(Currency)
RouletteTooHighMessage.label: Roulette value too high
RouletteTooHighMessage.tooltip: Bot response when someone tries to bet above the max roulette value.

ShowRouletteTooHighMessage.label: Display roulette value too high message?
ShowRouletteTooHighMessage.tooltip: Display roulette value too high message?

ChallengerNotEnoughPointsMessage.label: Challenger not enough points
ChallengerNotEnoughPointsMessage.tooltip: Bot response when the challenger does not have enough points to start a challenge with that high of an amount.

ShowChallengerNotEnoughPointsMessage.label: Display challenger not enough points message?
ShowChallengerNotEnoughPointsMessage.tooltip: Display challenger not enough points message?

TargetNotEnoughPointsMessage.label: Target not enough points
TargetNotEnoughPointsMessage.tooltip: Bot response when a bet has been placed.

ShowTargetNotEnoughPointsMessage.label: Display target not enough points message?

ChallengeCompleteMessage.value: $(Display) challenged $(Target) in Russian Roulette, with a bet of $(RouletteAmount) $(Currency)!
ChallengeCompleteMessage.label: Challange completed
ChallengeCompleteMessage.tooltip: Bot response when a russian roulette is completed.

RejectMessage.label: Challange rejected
RejectMessage.tooltip: Bot response if the challenge was rejected.

HelpMessage.value: Start a 1v1 Russian Roulette through: $(Command) [USER] [BET AMOUNT]
HelpMessage.label: Help message
HelpMessage.tooltip: Bot response if invalid syntax (!command all alone as an example).

TargetNoResponseMessage.value: $(Target) never responded and the game has been canceled.
TargetNoResponseMessage.label: Target never responded
TargetNoResponseMessage.tooltip: Bot response when the challenger never responded within the set timespan.

BeginningMessage.value: The revolver has been prepared and the game has begun.
BeginningMessage.label: Russian Roulette starting
BeginningMessage.tooltip: Bot response when russian roulette about to start.

MissMessages.label: Miss Messages
MissMessages.tooltip: 1 message on each line, picked randomly

HitMessages.label: Hit Messages
HitMessages.tooltip: 1 message on each line, picked randomly

ReloadButton.label: Reload settings
ReloadButton.tooltip: Reload script settings, make sure to save first.
